description: Use fresh peaches and mint to create this easy peach iced tea bursting with flavour. The perfect summer beverage, make this for a picnic or afternoon tea.
name: Peach Iced Tea Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Cut remaining peach into thick wedges. Divide peach wedges and remaining mint among 6 x 1 1/2-cup capacity glasses half-filled with ice cubes. Pour over peach tea. Serve.
